exec: pm.test("Response time is less than 5000s", function () {

request.description:
## *Generate Order:*

This API will generate an order in the Lifafa system and return "**order_id**" as the response. This "**order_id**" needs to be passed in the next API "Confirm Order".

1.  The **order_id** is valid for 12 mins from the creation.
2.  The **order_id** and **order_number** need to stored in the merchant database.
3.  **order_number** is just for reference, this is used in the reports and not in any API calls
4.  Currently, only max up to 4 quantity of gift cards are allowed/SKU/order. If you wish to place more than 4 quantities can make another API call by splitting the SKU quantity

response.name: Invalid access - 401

header.value: ORIGIN, AUTHORIZATION, X-REQUESTED-WITH, CONTENT-TYPE, x-goomo-platform, StoreId
ORIGIN, AUTHORIZATION, X-REQUESTED-WITH, CONTENT-TYPE, x-goomo-platform, StoreId

response.name: Bad Request - 400 - Wrong Value

header.value: ORIGIN, AUTHORIZATION, X-REQUESTED-WITH, CONTENT-TYPE, x-goomo-platform, StoreId

response.name: Bad Request - 400 - Invalid data type

header.value: ORIGIN, AUTHORIZATION, X-REQUESTED-WITH, CONTENT-TYPE, x-goomo-platform, StoreId
ORIGIN, AUTHORIZATION, X-REQUESTED-WITH, CONTENT-TYPE, x-goomo-platform, StoreId

response.name: Bad Request - 400 - Different SKU Ids in one request

header.value: ORIGIN, AUTHORIZATION, X-REQUESTED-WITH, CONTENT-TYPE, x-goomo-platform, StoreId
ORIGIN, AUTHORIZATION, X-REQUESTED-WITH, CONTENT-TYPE, x-goomo-platform, StoreId

response.name: Bad Request  - 400 - Required Fileds Missing

header.value: ORIGIN, AUTHORIZATION, X-REQUESTED-WITH, CONTENT-TYPE, x-goomo-platform, StoreId
ORIGIN, AUTHORIZATION, X-REQUESTED-WITH, CONTENT-TYPE, x-goomo-platform, StoreId
ORIGIN, AUTHORIZATION, X-REQUESTED-WITH, CONTENT-TYPE, x-goomo-platform, StoreId

request.description:
## *Confirm Order:*

This API will create gift cards for the requested SKU and quantity in the "Generate Order API". The "**order_id**" from the "Generate Order API" API will be the input for this API request.

##### ***Note: This is the API where actually balance will be debited from the merchant wallet.***

response.name: Invalid access - 401

header.value: ORIGIN, AUTHORIZATION, X-REQUESTED-WITH, CONTENT-TYPE, x-goomo-platform, StoreId

response.name: Bad Request - 400 - Order is already processed

header.value: ORIGIN, AUTHORIZATION, X-REQUESTED-WITH, CONTENT-TYPE, x-goomo-platform, StoreId
ORIGIN, AUTHORIZATION, X-REQUESTED-WITH, CONTENT-TYPE, x-goomo-platform, StoreId
